text: The pulmonary myocardium gene network and coexpressed genes are associated with cardiac phenotypes overlapping those of the stressed heart A limitation to single trait / transcript analysis is that it does not allow for combinatorial interactions with additional genetic loci , because each trait is individually regressed against every marker , i . e . , only one locus is considered per trait ( Michaelson et al . 2009 ) . Therefore , all n 24 pulmonary myocardium gene network transcripts were merged into a single trait using PCA . A network of 100 probes that correlated ( r . 0 . 553 , P , 2 . 40e 205 ) with the synthetic PCA trait was identified .
